Last night I gave a brief, 10 minute introduction to HTML5 at the Grand Rapids Web Development Group. Here are the slides from my presentation:

Many people mentioned that they enjoyed hearing the history. For those that want to read more, check out Mark Pilgrim’s Dive Into HTML5.
